body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"ビジネステクニック","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"先にシンプルなものを見せ、オプションを付け足していく","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"一貫性の原理","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"学習すべきこと","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"メモについて、ユースケースで集約してみる。\n\nこの記事では、学習した内容をもとに、「実際にどのようなユースケースにおいて応用できるか？」についてまとめたノート内容となる。","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
